duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide consultative service to customers, addressing inquiries, billing questions, policy changes, and rate changes.
Adapt to each customer, focusing on efficient problem-solving with a low customer effort approach.
Manage time and exhibit reliability in an ever-changing, fast-paced contact center environment.
Deliver insurance and eligibility information, solutions, and initiatives to provide a positive customer experience to internal and external customers.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or equivalent (Four-year college degree preferred). Completion of required additional training.
